dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: A puny interloper dares to venture into our realm? Speak quickly, for your presence here is unwelcome.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking knowledge about this place.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Your kind's notion of peace is laughable. What knowledge could you possibly seek here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand the balance of power in this land, can we not coexist?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? In the Veil of Eternal Shadow, power is all that matters. You lack the strength to survive here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave peacefully then, no need for conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you should. Your departure spares you from the flames of our wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You underestimate me, I will not back down from a challenge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, little one. Prepare to be consumed by the fires of the Inferno Salamanders.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand the history and culture of your kind, can you enlighten me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: History? Culture? Such trivial concepts hold no value in our world. Begone before you meet your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will respect your wishes and leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise choice. Your respect for our domain may spare you from a fiery demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not leave until I have learned what I came for.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn fool. You shall learn the price of defying the Flameguardians.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek allies in my quest, will you join forces against a common enemy?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Allies? The Inferno Salamanders stand alone, and so shall you if you do not leave at once.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, I will depart and seek aid elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. The wise know when to flee the flames.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not retreat, I stand my ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: And so you shall fall on that ground, crushed under the weight of our fury.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no interest in talking. Prepare yourself for a battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A direct approach, I respect that. Let the flames of combat decide your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will show you no mercy in this fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mercy is a foreign concept to the Flameguardians. Prepare for annihilation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let's see if your flames can match my blade.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your bravado will do little to quench the fires that shall consume you.
